TraitDef.label: Kagen Clan
TraitDef.description: Member of the prestigious Kagen clan, renowned throughout Dwemer society for their mastery of tonal architecture and the construction of great machines.

li.label: Kagen Clanmate
li.description: A member of Clan Kagen, raised with deep knowledge of engineering and tonal architecture. Their understanding of sound and vibration allows them to craft superior constructs.

li.label: Kagen Master Engineer
li.description: A master engineer of Clan Kagen, capable of creating the most complex tonal architectures and mechanical wonders that define Dwemer civilization.

TraitDef.label: Rourken Clan
TraitDef.description: Member of the exile Rourken clan, who left Morrowind rather than submit to the Tribunal. Known for their exceptional smithing abilities and fierce independence.

li.label: Rourken Clanmate
li.description: A member of the proud Rourken clan, bearing the skills of master smiths and the stubborn independence that led to their exile from Morrowind.

li.label: Rourken Master Smith
li.description: A master smith of Clan Rourken, capable of forging the finest Dwemer metal and creating weapons that rival even the great hammers of legend.

TraitDef.label: Freehold Clan
TraitDef.description: Member of the Freehold clan, Dwemer who combine engineering prowess with shrewd business acumen, serving as merchants and negotiators for their people.

li.label: Freehold Clanmate
li.description: A member of Clan Freehold, raised to understand both the intricacies of Dwemer technology and the art of profitable negotiation with outsiders.

li.label: Freehold Trade Master
li.description: A trade master of Clan Freehold, combining deep technological knowledge with unparalleled skills in negotiation and commercial enterprise.
